mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY order_id DESC

SELECT d.d_id AS dId, d.order_id AS orderId, d.product_id AS productId, d.quantity AS quantity, d.order_time AS orderTime, d.completed AS completed, p.product_name AS productName, p.price AS price, p.c_id AS categoryId, p.img AS img, p.like_count AS likeCount FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_detail d ON o.order_id = d.order_id JOIN t_product p ON d.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY d.d_id ASC;
